summary: Sales professional with extensive experience in account management, business development, and marketing across education and digital media sectors. Proven track record of growing pipelines, managing cross-functional teams, and exceeding sales targets through strong relationships and strategic planning.

experience.title: Sales Representative
experience.description: Responsible for day-to-day relationship management of over 40 clients regarding planning, production, marketing, sales and distribution of Josten's yearbook program; maintained account volume over 700k, led the lifecycle of customer programs from idea generation to marketing campaigns, and used Salesforce to log communications and update the new business pipeline; built partnerships with school administration and staff; contributed to YoY growth and achieving 50% to goal for 2017 new business.

experience.title: Digital Media Sales Representative
experience.description: Managed online advertising for over 60 dealer partners; sold Cars.com ad packages and ancillary products; advised on allocation of advertising budgets using SEO/paid search/traditional media analyses; coached dealerships on best practices; conducted monthly marketing reviews; negotiated a largest sale to date in Philadelphia (May 2013); Presidents Club - Exceeded 2013 sales goal by 228%; Awarded Top Digital Media Representative for new volume growth (2013); Awarded Top Cars 360 net unit sales certificate of Achievement (2013).

experience.title: Senior Sales Coordinator
experience.description: Managed daily communication between supply chain, account managers, transportation, accounting, and compliance departments solving a wide variety of ad-hoc requests; appointed to handle 'Strategic National Accounts' - the largest and most profitable Braskem accounts; analyzed customer purchase orders and forecasting; developed a bi-monthly account analysis model adopted companywide; led prospecting survey for Braskem at National Plastics Exposition 2012.

experience.title: Sales and Marketing Assistant
experience.description: Created marketing materials for home sales and assisted with open houses; prepared comparative marketing analyses to obtain new clients; increased client base by developing relationships with current clients through online media; staffed new construction sites and assisted in marketing for new homes.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Marketing International Business
education.school: Pennsylvania State University, Smeal College of Business

certifications: Presidents Club - Exceeded 2013 sales goal by 228%
Awarded Top Digital Media Representative for new volume growth (2013)
Awarded Top Cars 360 net unit sales certificate of Achievement (2013)
